title: Auto staff may see another year of double-digit hikes
description: India's automotive sector employers are likely to offer higher than average pay rises in 2024 to retain talent. The average pay rise is expected to be 10.5% for automotive producers and 10% for suppliers, according to Deloitte's study. This trend is driven by high attrition, focus on electric vehicles, and robust auto industry performance.
